SELECT * FROM (SELECT h.hbidx , h.midx , u.nickname , h.title , h.content , h.wdate , h.cnt , h.filename , h.cate , h.tag , h.delyn FROM howf h, usertable u WHERE h.midx = u.midx) a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT bidx , COUNT(hidx) as heart FROM heart WHERE type='howf' GROUP BY bidx) b on a.hbidx = b.bidx WHERE a.delyn = 'N'
AND (a.title like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR a.tag like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
AND a.title like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND a.tag like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
ORDER BY a.wdate desc
ORDER BY b.heart desc, a.wdate desc
AND a.cate = '맛집추천' ORDER BY a.wdate desc
AND a.cate = '숙박추천' ORDER BY a.wdate desc
AND a.cate = '여행지추천' ORDER BY a.wdate desc
LIMIT #{page}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT COUNT(h.hbidx) FROM howf h, usertable u WHERE h.midx = u.midx AND h.delyn = 'N'
AND (h.title like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR h.tag like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
AND h.title like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND h.tag like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND h.cate = '맛집추천'
AND h.cate = '숙박추천'
AND h.cate = '여행지추천'
SELECT hbidx , title , filename , cate FROM howf WHERE cate = '숙박추천' ORDER BY wdate desc LIMIT 0,1
SELECT hbidx , title , filename , cate FROM howf WHERE cate = '여행지추천' ORDER BY wdate desc LIMIT 0,1
SELECT hbidx , title , filename , cate FROM howf WHERE cate = '맛집추천' ORDER BY wdate desc LIMIT 0,1

SELECT a.hbidx , a.midx , a.title , a.content , a.wdate , a.cnt , a.filename , a.cate , a.tag , b.heart FROM howf a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT bidx , COUNT(hidx) as heart FROM heart WHERE type='howf' GROUP BY bidx) b on a.hbidx = b.bidx WHERE a.hbidx = #{hbidx}
